newsitem.title: MEXICO: Gissa to pay 0.3 peso per share dividend.
newsitem.headline: Gissa to pay 0.3 peso per share dividend.

text.p: Industrial holding Grupo Industrial Saltillo (GISSA) informed the Mexican Stock Exchange on Wednesday that it will pay a cash dividend of 30 centavos per share on September 27.
GISSA reported that it had agreed to the dividend at its annual shareholders' meeting on April 26, which it will pay on delivery of coupon number 28.
GISSA's nominal share price will thus adjust to 22.70 pesos.
